ids_alerts.rule_msg: ET INFO DERO Crypto Mining Related Domain in DNS Lookup
ids_alerts.rule_raw: alert dns $HOME_NET any -> any any (msg:"ET INFO DERO Crypto Mining Related Domain in DNS Lookup"; dns.query; bsize:27; content:"community-pools.mysrv.cloud"; nocase; reference:md5,10741cc3063b3b940929dc29cf7636c0; reference:url,www.crowdstrike.com/blog/crowdstrike-discovers-first-ever-dero-cryptojacking-campaign-targeting-kubernetes; classtype:coin-mining; sid:2046700; rev:1; metadata:attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2023_06_29, deployment Perimeter, performance_impact Low, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2023_06_29; target:src_ip;)

mitre_attack_techniques.signature_description: Adversaries may communicate using application layer protocols to avoid detection/network filtering by blending in with existing traffic.
ELF contains segments with high entropy indicating compressed/encrypted content
May try to detect the virtual machine to hinder analysis (VM artifact strings found in memory)
Reads system information from the proc file system
Detected TCP or UDP traffic on non-standard ports

signature_matches.name: stealth_network
signature_matches.description: Network activity detected but not expressed in monitor API logs
Sample contains only a LOAD segment without any section mappings

match_data: $Info: This file is packed with the UPX executable packer http://upx.sf.net $

signature_matches.description: All HTTP servers contacted by the sample do not answer. The sample is likely an old dropper which does no longer work.
Connects to IPs without corresponding DNS lookups
Reads system information from the proc file system
May try to detect the virtual machine to hinder analysis (VM artifact strings found in memory)
Tries to connect to HTTP servers, but all servers are down (expired dropper behavior)
Detected TCP or UDP traffic on non-standard ports
URLs found in memory or binary data
ELF contains segments with high entropy indicating compressed/encrypted content
